column2: Come on sweetheart, use you magic to clean all those worms !
(Make her believe she is doing it herself...)
(Wait for her to make a move !)
(You have to click on the worms when she makes a move !)
Do a wider move to clear more worms.
(You have to clear more worms when she does this gesture.)
(If worms are grouped in a large pile, don't clear all at once.)
